```{r}
library(bestpredictor)
library(tidyverse)
sf_salaries <- read.csv("/Users/sucheen/Documents/Cal Poly SLO/Academics/Spring 2021/STAT 331-01/Data/SF_Salaries_sub.csv")
```

```{r}
sf_salaries[, unlist(lapply(sf_salaries, is.numeric))]
response = "TotalPay"
sf_salaries <- select(sf_salaries, Id, EmployeeName, JobTitle, BasePay, OvertimePay,OtherPay, TotalPay, TotalPayBenefits, Year, Agency) %>%
  select_if(is.numeric)
final <- c()
for(i in names(sf_salaries)) {
  f <- paste(response, "~", i)
  m <- lm(formula = f, data = sf_salaries) %>% anova() %>% pluck("Sum Sq")
  final <- append(final, m)
}
```
